text: He kitabira! Sbiya dinera madhye tomara barabari karo na [1] ebam allahara upara satya byatita kichu balo na. Mara'iyama-tanaya isa masiha kebala allahara rasula ebam tamra bani [2], ya tini mara'iyamera kache pathiyechilena o tamra paksa theke ruha.
